directions: Preheat oven to 350°F. Toss almonds, oil, and paprika on a rimmed baking sheet to coat; spread out in a single layer and toast, tossing occasionally, until dark golden brown, 8-10 minutes. Transfer to a bowl, sprinkle with salt, and toss to coat. Let cool. DO AHEAD: Nuts can be toasted 1 week ahead. Store airtight at room temperature.
ingredients: Ingredient info: Marcona almonds can be found at natural and specialty foods stores and at latienda.com. Smoked paprika is available at most supermarkets.
title: Marcona Almonds with Smoked Paprika
